ModMetaData.name: Modern Bed
ModMetaData.author: Holgast
ModMetaData.description: Adds a sheet-paintable modern bed made of fabric or leather, as well as either wood or steel. Also modifies VE ergonomic and advanced beds to be made of a steel core and fabric stuff. And also, adds better rest effectiveness for certain soft materials. Adapted from the original by SiCafe.
